comments:
I am running eclipse 3.0.2 on an aix-machine.

This error seem to cause a lot of other errors (at the moment I am not able to
compile my projects).

I imported a whole workspace via TeamProjectSet - after that i found a lot of
errors in the Error-View.

The same projects on a Windows XP don't make any problems (same settings on both
machines).



The first error in the Error-View:

Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-in: "org.eclipse.core.runtime".

java.lang.IllegalStateException: zip file closed
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.ensureOpen(ZipFile.java(Inlined Compiled Code))

eclipse.buildId=unknown
java.fullversion=J2RE 1.4.2 IBM AIX build ca142sr1a-20050209 (JIT enabled: jitc)
BootLoader constants: OS=aix, ARCH=ppc, WS=motif, NL=en_GB
Command-line arguments: -application org.eclipse.ui.ide.workbench -pdelaunch


===============================================================================

Maybe the previous error (as information in Error-Dialog) causes this ?:

Could not load library: libcore_2_1_0b.a.
This library provides platform-specific optimizations for certain file system
operations.
This library is not present on all platforms, so this may not be an error.
The resources plug-in will safely fall back to using java.io.File functionality.

I do not know AIX machine and can't say whether your problem might be related
with this library error...
However, I wonder that your eclipse build is unknown!
Perhaps this unknown build is not really valid for AIX...
Could you install latest stable build (at least RC1) and reopen if it does still
happen?
Thx
